TitleEnglish: Caressing the Nipples of My Hibernating Bear
SummaryEnglish: Nowa, a bear living in the forest, decides to take an abandoned puppy under his wing. He names it Airi and takes care of it with great care. Time passes and Nowa soon has to leave him temporarily alone in order to hibernate. Waking up several months later, he discovers that Airi has grown well into an attractive young man.

1.TitleEnglish: 第3.5話「番外編『森のくまさん、休憩中。』①」
1.SummaryEnglish:
詳細情報
番組内容
「ノワと番になりたい！」
森で暮らすクマのノワは、子犬を拾った。アイリと名付けて大事に育てることに。初めての子育てに右往左往しつつも、アイリは素直で優しい子にすくすく成長。２人仲良く暮らしていたが、ノワにはある悩みが…。それは、もうすぐ冬眠の時期なのに、アイリが乳離れしてくれないこと！こんなに甘えん坊で大丈夫だろうか…？不安な気持ちを抱えたまま、どうにか冬ごもりを始めて数か月。
番組内容２
胸に違和感を感じて目を覚ますと…目の前には大きな成犬が!?もしかして…あのアイリ!?乳離れできないワンコ×親バカなおっとりクマさんの癒し系ケモミミBL登場・
出演者
【アイリ】天﨑滉平
【ノワ】興津和幸
【コウ】河西健吾
【ワタリ】山下誠一郎
スタッフ
【監督】古賀一臣
【脚本】夏冬しのび
【キャラクターデザイン】鬼澤近至
【総作画監督】林あすか,山中いづみ
【衣装デザイン】橋本真希
【色彩設計】やぐちさえ
【美術設定】佐藤桃子
【美術監督】中津海瑠夏（マカリア）
【撮影監督】板倉あゆみ
【編集】新海コウキ
【音響監督】えんどうさとこ
【音響制作】ブラックフラッグ
【アニメーション制作】studio H0KIBOSHI
【製作】彗星社
主題歌
『繋いだ手とぬくもりと』
アイリ（CV.天﨑滉平），ノワ（CV.興津和幸）

1.TitleEnglish: When the cute bear needs to hibernate...
1.SummaryEnglish: Nowa, a bear, picked up a newborn puppy. He named it Airi and carefully raised it for several months. Airi grew up to be a gentle and obedient child, but he has a big problem: he can't wean himself off of Nowa's nipples. Nowa wonders if it is safe for Airi to be such a spoiled child? With such anxiety in his mind, he somehow manages to start his hibernation.

2.TitleEnglish: When it's time to leave the parent nest...
2.SummaryEnglish: When Nowa woke up from hibernation, he found a big, grown-up Airi in front of him! "I want to do it with you Nowa," Airi asks. "Can you teach me how to do it?" How should Nowa treat him as a parent?

3.SummaryEnglish: Nowa cannot refuse Airi even though he thinks it is not right as a nurturing parent. He asks Kou for advice on what she should do. With Kou's advice, Nowa decides to take action.

4.TitleEnglish: When the doggy asks for something...
4.SummaryEnglish: Nowa lost control and clung to Airi when he suddenly became horny. He regrets that he was an unfit parent to want him.... Nowa decides to face up to it and has a talk with Airi.

5.SummaryEnglish: Nowa and Airi help out at the bakery in place of their grandmother, who has a bad back. While the two are working the store, something happens to Nowa's nipples!

6.TitleEnglish: When he goes for his first job...
6.SummaryEnglish: Airi tries his best to carry out the "Nowa's Nipple Protection Plan." He applies medicine and puts a bandage on them... He tries to help them using various methods, but they are in pretty bad shape. Nowa's nipples become more and more sensitive by the day.

7.TitleEnglish: When they go on a first date...
7.SummaryEnglish: Nowa and Airi are on a friendly picnic date. Airi is in a good mood and is smiling. He's thinking that he hasn't held hands since he was a little boy. Airi, with a more mature expression on his face than ever before, tries to hold his lover's hand.

8.SummaryEnglish: Airi's desire to be Nowa's partner becames even stronger. As he wonders what he can do to help, he suddenly becomes concerned about the trauma that Nowa has been through, and asks Kou about it.

9.TitleEnglish: When you want to become lovers...
9.SummaryEnglish: Airi, who is carrying out a "plan to get rid of Nowa's trauma," asks Kuro, whom he met at the library, for something. Will Nowa be released from his trauma? And will the two be able to progress to a relationship that is more than father and son?
